# ndefMessagePayload

**Instance Property**

The NDEF message read by the system in the background.

## Declaration

```swift
var ndefMessagePayload: NFCNDEFMessage { get }
```

## Discussion

For user activities not generated by background tag reading, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity/ndefMessagePayload] returns a message that contains only one [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCNDEFPayload] record. That record has a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCNDEFPayload/typeNameFormat] of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCTypeNameFormat/empty]. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreNFC/adding-support-for-background-tag-reading].
